document.full_text: wellpoint inc  posted a quarterly profit far above analyst estimates, helped by health plan membership gains and lower-than-expected medical costs, and the insurer raised its full-year earnings outlook.
document.title: wellpoint raises full-year view as profit beats
lines_and_colors: wellpoint inc  posted a quarterly profit far above analyst estimates, helped by health plan membership gains and lower-than-expected medical costs, and the insurer raised its full-year earnings outlook.
